name: Rudolph Saves Christmas
description:
Santa is sick this Christmas, and is unable to deliver presents, however not all hope is lost, one brave reindeer steps up to save the day, Rudolph!

Guide Rudolph as he soars over rooftops, line up your shadow with the chimneys, and drop presents into each house, test yourself to see how many presents you can get in the chimneys! But be careful if you drop presents outside of the chimneys you'll lose points, and if you fail to drop a present into a chimney, you'll lose a life( and might be put on the naughty list for not delivering poor Timmy's new robot action figure! ), if you lose all 3 lives, it's game over!
